documents.document: Random non-political news. Anyone looking for a new niche career path? https://t.co/yVfLjuJx4s
Getting lots of reading done this week while baby is sleeping. Wish I could sleep myself though. Zombie.
Iced the Xmas cake I made back in October. Looks good! Can't wait to eat it. It's so full of brandy that I couldn't eat it while pregnant.
So this wee cherub is totally conked out on my chest after a restless night. I guess I'm stuck here. https://t.co/XK5kKuU7dh
@corinh that's what I thought too, but then doubted my thinking. Glad someone else had the same thought.
So how soon is too soon to use a photo-editing app on your days-old baby? Poor wee lad. https://t.co/ATMwFbdElK
No one tells you about all the cute little meebles and sounds newborns make.
Our wee little boy Archer McIntyre arrived on 22nd Jan at 1.03pm. He was a couple of weeks early, weighing 2.47kg.… https://t.co/EP14T8L3Bx
@Fiona_KerrNZ I thought I would've had two more weeks to do my kegel exercises.
I'm being induced 2wks early tomorrow. Eek! On the upside I'll miss the inauguration. Silver lining.
Can't believe Wellington has gone from apocalyptic to summer weather in a few hours. Supposed to hail tonight so, you know, back to normal.
Thanks #WeatherBomb for the self-pruning trees. Saves me a weekend job. Now if you could just pile all the prunings up in one place...
Wellington baristas will be raking it in today as cranky and sleep deprived zombie workers descend on the city. #weatherbomb
House is getting hammered by huge wind gusts. Everything is shaking. Can't sleep.#weatherbomb
Reckon the @WellingtonZoo cheetahs might be a bit grizzly about being outpaced by wheelie bins & trampolines tonigh… https://t.co/i4d39GHBRZ
An excellent quick read with well developed points and analysis. https://t.co/1CxgcQmlW7
@wendypooh can I suggest some kind of comb over? https://t.co/vPT44YVhGu
Is it too much to ask for a tea towel that actually absorbs liquids rather than just pushing it around?!
@corinh hold on tight!
Watched a doco on how Bowie conceived and wrote his music, & am now re-listening to his music with a more educated & facinated ear. Amazing.
@realstephnieb shucks! I think the days were I skateboarded to the local aeroclub to pilot a flight to a friend's farm were my coolest tho.
Currently playing Fat Boy Slim to my baby bump and having flash backs to days when I was younger and cooler.
Pregnancy is basically 9 months of filling your body with food and managing the various fluids leaking out. That's reality folks. Fun times.
Hashtag back to work today hashtag sad face.
@KiwiLibrarian apparently that has nothing to do with it *shrugs* midwife says it could just be the position the baby is in.
My baby bump is on the small side of normal. So off for *another* scan I go. At least I get to see Cletus-the-Fetus… https://t.co/vROxq7kDLb
@SamEEENZ eventually. We have to rebuild all our decks, this one was delt to first because it was getting dangerous.
Currently- destroying a deck that was rotting. The chooks approve of their new scratching & dust bathing area. https://t.co/yb9a44vxF8
Also,at 8pm tonight I started dismantling the back deck with a hammer and crowbar. No more rotting timber!
Stoopid nesting instinct making me do all the housework.
@MsBeeton very cute! I'm 35wks along at the mo and couldn't imagine popping bubs out yet- I feel so unprepared! Kudos to the new mum.
@Aaronflemingnz I hear Ironman Florianopolis in Brazil is a good one. A friend of mine did it this year and enjoyed it.
Someone left a chocolate caramel slice on the kitchen bench (me) & someone keeps eating it (also me). https://t.co/wZX1JqjqGd
The simple act of cleaning out the under sink cupboard is the kitchen has kick started a dangerous chain reaction of cupboard cleaning.
Facebook reminded me that used to put in more of an effort for New Years 9 years ago. Thanks FB :-/ https://t.co/623JiAxEzR
Started 2017 how I mean to go on with tea and toast in bed this morning.
Why do 2017 when you can just catch a @metlinkwgtn train to 2065? Must be a fast train. https://t.co/k72RRa1PXp
Cooking up meals to freeze in prep for baby's arrival. So far- soup, beef stew & mac cheese. Last chance attempt at "Housewife of 2016".
Trying to get motivated to start on today's list, but the cat just snuggled into my lap, so I guess I'm stuck here for the next 6hrs.
Know what's fun? Clearing blackberry out of our gully. Haemorrhaging from a gazillion holes and cuts.
Beautiful morning for an early harbour swim. Bit nippy though. https://t.co/juvxWzLKrC
Lots of noisy rattling from the glasses and crockery, but not much swaying or movement. Strange. #eqnz
Willing to admit that I shouldn't have climbed and pruned those trees in the summer sun while 8.5mths preggers. Whew!
@MsBeeton that's exciting though! Whoot!
Merry Christmas from our chickens who loudly decided we should be awake and feeding them at 5am this morning. https://t.co/0mdQqsxNQ1
@MsBeeton light the BBQ and burn it clean. Don't blast off all that 'flavour'
Why is Cherry Ripe even included in Cadbury Favourites? Which tasteless bastard has that one as their favourite??
Dear 2016, please leave Carrie Fisher alone. Haven't you don't enough already? Regards, Adrienne.
Arrived home from work to find my degree has arrived in the post. Best Christmas present! (So pleased I don't have to go to grad ceremony)
Hey guys, did you know you can fit pesto dip in your car cup holder? We're living in an amazing age. https://t.co/euCweZp58b
My bus driver is dressed as Santa this morning. Nice touch. 🎅
Just casually had a random encounter with the Webb Ellis Cup this evening. https://t.co/E6RSWa31E0
@WgtnCC thanks!
Hi @WgtnCC we have large cardboard boxes from flatpack furniture. How do we put these out for recycling? Won't fit in bin or bag. Thanks!
Pub quiz. I'm such a party animal.
Merry summer solstice everyone. It sure felt like the longest day, amiright?
Watching the TV prog hoarders to make myself feel better about my lack of domestic goddess.
@everydaymanager we thought it was some kind of rangiora too. But the tree books have been no help. https://t.co/uFFU1KwoS5
Anyone know the name of this tree? Growing rampant in our Wellington back yard. https://t.co/cHKkv16vPC
Willing to give this a go! https://t.co/JWgrHh3BYG
Great drive up to Rotorua today, perfect weather and views. About to go for a swim in the lake 👍
Really great to see the new graduates walking around the city streets in their robes. Be proud!
Office Max in Wellington CBD getting ahead of the market. https://t.co/GeFRxqnW3k
My dad has this great established art business & is now finally on Facebook. Nab yourself some arty xmas pressies: https://t.co/hk5G9MKyge
Ugh. Accidentally signed off an email with 'Kind Retards'. It's been a long week.
Today I have set myself a personal challenge of eating the leftover cake from our baby shower while it's still at it's best. Wish me luck!
Tough job! All the best to David Shearer: New Zealander to head UN mission in South Sudan https://t.co/ClFNzfTb0r via @YahooNews
Currently obsessing over my newly bouncy and wavy pregnancy hair. Finally there's an upside to these rollercoaster hormones.
Dear Santa, I really hope the housework fairies visited while I was at work today. Forever yours. Adrienne.
Hubby has taken my place as a triathlete as I grow a baby. He was feeling particularly triumphant after his first o… https://t.co/HLHIX9srvq
GIANT spider in the bedroom this morning. It reached 'burn the house down' level on the 'Adrienne Scary Spider Scale'. Hubby to the rescue.
@mrhay good for you! We'll try not to accidentally burn the place down in your absence.
@corinh demolition porn! Rawr.
And now Ray Columbus. https://t.co/SF8ejt8Rpp
This is a public warning to the person who wants to add item number 1000002 to my to do list.
Unapologetically directing all the aircon vents in the car towards my pregnant body.
Had a very satisfying dream last night about housework. Woke up to find my house still filthy. I think my subconscious is sending a message.
Im at my sexiest when I have lunch smeared across my face. I'm such a catch.
Am only just getting around to dinner now, & all I want to do is go to bed. But the ever growing baby bump demands feeding.
Spent today measuring, cutting, attaching & painting skirting boards. Also found the time to weed a big garden & fill it with vege seedlings
The likelihood of someone wanting to speak with me just after I've shoved food in my mouth are increasing day by day. Pregnancy's a blast!
Not used to being so clumsy. I should have some kind of warning label attached to me. Related: did someone move my office doorframe?
@mrhay maybe think of it as a fun playground slide...?
If you're struggling to sprout seed potatoes, just give them to me & I'll pop them in my pantry. Seriously, it's hairy potato city in there.
Time from opening marmite jar to getting some stuck in my hair? 20 seconds. I have mad as breakfast skills.
Spent today sanding, prepping & painting the nursery. All that tranquil nesting was balanced out by playing loud rock/metal music throughout
Some days I really wish I wasn't a morning person. I could've done with the sleep in this morning.
@LeilaniJM donations of food from local businesses to the people working 24/7 at WREMO. It's really helped us through.
16hr work day today. Stoopid earthquakes. #shakeitoff
Wellington is cut off with both SH1 and SH2 closed due to flooding. Yelp! Check with @NZTAWgtn for updates.
@irihapeta both hubby and cat are sleep twitchers, so you have my understanding and sympathy.
That age-old family favourite Wellington game of 'Wind Gust or Earthquake?' will be challenging tonight. #eqnz
@JuliadeRuiter hubby just flew out of Welly airport. Air bridges not working, but flights are still arriving and departing at the mo.
First test for all those new Mayors and Councillors. Kia kaha!
Even Mother Earth doesn't like Mondays. A clear sign we should all just stay home in the morning.
@MsBeeton us too!
Holy fuck. That was a big one! Stuff falling off the shelves in Wellington. Cat feaked out. Humans outta bed. #eqnz
@Aaronflemingnz wow! Great looking medal. Congrats on your finish :)
@Aaronflemingnz yeouch! I've been to Langkawi a few times and I know how hot it can get. Enjoy the scenic course, watch out for monkeys!
@Aaronflemingnz all the best! Stay hydrated. Looking forward to a finish line update. I'm totally jealous!
